#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
inline ll scan()
{
    char c = getchar_unlocked();
    register ll x = 0;
    bool neg=false;
    if(c=='-')
    {
        neg=true;
    }
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
    {
        c=getchar_unlocked();
        
    }
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    if(neg==false) return x;
    else if(neg==true) return -1*x;
}
struct node
{
    /* data */
    ll score,pos;
};
node ar[412345];
bool cmp(node a,node b)
{
    if(a.score==b.score)
    {
        return a.pos<b.pos;
    }
    else return a.score>b.score;
}
int main()
{
    register ll i,j,k,l,m,n,p,q,x,y;
    n=scan();
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        j=scan();k=scan();
        ar[i].score=j*k;
        ar[i].pos=i;
    }
    sort(ar+1,ar+1+n,cmp);
    q=scan();
    while(q--)
    {
        p=scan();
        printf("%lld\n",ar[p].pos);
    }
    return 0;
}
